components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Datora Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Datora Network in Brazil. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Datora Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Engineers have identified the issue impacting Language Operators powered by OpenAI within our Voice Intelligence product and are continuing to work with the vendor to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in the 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Intelligence

incident_updates.body: Engineers have identified the issue impacting Language Operators powered by OpenAI within our Voice Intelligence product and are working with the vendor to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in the 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Intelligence

incident_updates.body: We are currently investigating an issue impacting Language Operators powered by OpenAI within our Voice Intelligence product. Customers using Language Operators powered by OpenAI may see delays in their Transcripts and Language Operator results being available. Our engineering teams are working on resolving the issue, and we will provide another update in the next 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Intelligence

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Programmable Voice - Intelligence. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Intelligence

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue impacting the Flex Agent Copilot features like Wrap-up Notes, KB Assist, etc. and are continuing to work with a provider to resolve this issue. affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Agent Desktop

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue impacting the Flex Agent Copilot features like Wrap-up Notes, KB Assist, etc. and are working with a provider to resolve this issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Agent Desktop

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Agent Desktop

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue in relation to the Flex AI. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The MegaFon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 June 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 10 June 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon Russia handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 June 2025 at 17:00 PDT until 12 June 2025 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 June 2025 at 17:00 PDT until 11 June 2025 at 05:00 PDT
11 June 2025 at 17:00 PDT until 12 June 2025 at 05:00 PDT

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned maintenance in the US between 06/10/2025 22:00 and 06/11/2025 04:00 Pacific Time. During the maintenance window, 10DLC numbers could experience delays with registration and\or de-registration. While 10DLC numbers are pending a registration update, traffic sent to\from those Twilio numbers could fail until their A2P provisioning completes.
